price: የቅርቢቱን ዓለም ምንዳ የሚፈልግ የኾነ ሰው አላህ ዘንድ የቅርቢቱና የመጨረሻይቱ ምንዳ አልለ፡፡ አላህም ሰሚ ተመልካች ነው፡፡
arabic: مَّن كَانَ يُرِيدُ ثَوَابَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا فَعِندَ ٱللَّهِ ثَوَابُ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ سَمِيعَۢا بَصِيرٗا

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: man kāna yurīdu thawāba al-dun'yā faʿinda al-lahi thawābu al-dun'yā wal-ākhirati wakāna al-lahu samīʿan baṣīran
